metadata.title: Exxon Valdez Oil Spill Affected Area
metadata.description: Data Type: Exxon Valdez Oil Spill;  The Exxon Valdez Oil Spill Area includes the area enclosed by the maximum extent of oiled shorelines, severely affected communities and their immediate human-use areas, and adjacent uplands to the watershed divide. The intended use of this dataset is as a resource for damage assessment and future restoration activities.
